OB: Under certain circumstances, the code assist feature is consuming excessive code.
EB: The code assist feature should only replace the specific code it is assisting with, without consuming any additional code.
SR:
1. Change the baz call to baz(x.x.foo())
2. Place the cursor after the first "x."
3. Press CtrlSpace to bring up the code assist
4. Type "f" to filter the list.
5. Select "foo()".
